name: Cube Alchemy: Sandbox
description:
Cube Alchemy it's a 3D voxel block sandbox building game for Windows and MacOS (game like Minecraft),  where you can create world with your own rules, explore procedurally generated infinite world map, save and edit your world at any time and publish your game project to let other people play it.

Create world - limited or infinite - with variety of landscapes using different biomes and time of the day.

Choose mod you want to play:

  • creative mode where you can build house, castle, or small town, create game on your own, like escape games,  3D platformers, parkour, puzzle, etc.;
  •  survival game where you should to survive, explore world and gather materials to create new stuff, tools and items, build shelter from enemies;
  •  play mode where you can test or play game scenario created in creative mode by your own or other people.

Make game on your own using build-in interactive game elements.

Save your game locally to edit or play it any time.

Publish your game project getting unique URL to page with your game to let other people play it or edit.

- change game setting and generate different types of 3D blocky world: flatlands or hills and mountains, landscape with flying islands or sea with isle, water world or world full of lava;

- in-game time allows to follows a day and night cycle or choose and freeze time of the day, for example, setting Night Time Only;

- use ability to generate limited world/map to make game levels where player need to find some hided stuff, for example;

- explore 5 different biomes: grassland, forest, desert, aquatic and snow world;

- mine resources and combine it to get new stuff;

- use unlimited inventory to collect all resources and things you found and crafted in game;

- build with standard blocks, carry physical objects, place them wherever you want;

- decorate your house with furniture, flowers, trees and so on;

- build under water, skating on the ice, roasting on lava;

- use Symmetry mode which allows you to place one cube and it could be mirrored 2 or 4 times. Change symmetry pivot to build symmetrical constructions in different parts of your 3D world;

- use Fly mode, ready-made blocks of buildings and trees to build faster;

- set/change time of the day, damages, number of objects and enemies on your game world;

- almost all settings of your game world/level can be saved - positions of portals, enemies and physics objects, time of the day, damages, and so on;

- created game world can be saved locally and published to user's gallery, and you will be provided with link to WebGL player with your game which will be available for any user from any browser;

- you can make your level editable or non-editable to make other players edit it or just play.

Use various game mechanics to make game on your own: locked doors, teleports, timers, block's replicator, TNTs, trampoline, elevator, vanishing blocks, flashlight, pickaxes, recipes (alchemy informers) to let players know how to create new stuff.

Use 4 different types of portalguns, portal-able surfaces, portal and emancipation grill to create puzzle minigames.

Liven up your game world with various types of entities - Monster Heads with hundreds of faces variants, skeletons, traders, cats, hippos, giraffes, foxes and racoons.

   or  - move around and control flight direction;

- hold LMB and move mouse to rotate camera;

- use space to jump;

   - pick up objects;

  - LMB click on POUCH ICON to collect everything you hold into inventory;

 - LMB click to select block and create new one in Creative mod. In Survival mode you should find or craft some tools like stick, pickaxe, portalgun, etc and hold LMB to destroy blocks;
 - RMB click to destroy any blocks and picked objects in Creative mod;

 or  - create BLUE portal when portalgun is in your hands;

 or    - create ORANGE portal when portalgun is in your hands.
